quotes.quote: What counts now is not just what we are against, but what we are for. Who leads us is less important than what leads us-what convictions, what courage, what faith-win or lose. A man doesn't save a century, or a civilization, but a militant party wedded to a principal can.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson Jr.

quotes.quote: Man is what he believes.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: I would never die for my beliefs because I might be wrong.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The public will believe anything, so long as it is not founded on truth.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: The thing always happens that you really believe in; and the belief in a thing makes it happen.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: With most men, unbelief in one thing springs from blind belief in another.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: The fact that a believer is happier than a skeptic is no more to the point than the fact that a drunken man is happier than a sober one.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I would rather have a mind opened by wonder than one closed by belief.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: In the province of the mind, what one believes to be true either is true or becomes true.
quotes.author: John Lilly

quotes.quote: Men willingly believe what they wish.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Oh, what a tangled web we weave when first we practice to believe.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: I never cease being dumbfounded by the unbelievable things people believe.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: Sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: They were so strong in their beliefs that there came a time when it hardly mattered what exactly those beliefs were; they all fused into a single stubbornness.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: Remember that what you believe will depend very much on what you are.
quotes.author: Noah Porter

quotes.quote: I can believe anything, provided that it is quite incredible.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Some things have to be believed to be seen.
quotes.author: Ralph Hodgson

quotes.quote: Unless you believe, you will not understand.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Every man prefers belief to the exercise of judgement.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Though a good deal is too strange to be believed, nothing is too strange to have happened.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Believe one who has proved it. Believe an expert.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: Those who can make you believe absurdities can make you commit atrocities.
quotes.author: Voltaire
